entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: With a mixture of guile and firepower you were able to move around the Valarian Depot and get a complete inventory of everything that they got from the smuggled cargo. Commander Barrezz was happy with the information and wants you to go and check out one more locale near the Darklighter Estate.
entries.journal_entry_description: The Valarian crime syndicate bought a portion of the cargo. According to your handler that portion of the cargo was trans-shipped to a storage yard up in the mountains near Bestine. You need to infiltrate the facility and get a full inventory of what the Valarians bought.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: Who knew that the Jawas could have scavenged that much? Next I need you to go to a Valarian base. Uploading the information now.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The Valarian smuggling operation has set up a base in the mountains north of Bestine. Go there, locate the cargo pallets and download the cargo manifests from the datapads located with each cargo pallet.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The Valarian portion of the cargo seems to be scattered throughout the site.You need to download the cargo manifest from the datapad located with each of the five pallets of cargo.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: Ok, looks like it's with the darklighter cargo. If we're ever to find this mysterious cargo from Tansarii Station, I'm going to need you to head to the Darklighter cave and search for the cargo there. We must find that cargo from Tansarii Point Station.
entries.task10_comm_message_text: I need you to go into the depot and check the manifests on each of those cargo pallets. Those pallets are part of the smuggled cargo from Tansarii Station and may contain what we're looking for.
